Description:
Time to build your dream home
Panoramic views of the bay and beyond, here's the opportunity to build and design a home to take a advantage of the view on this 685 sqm. Ideal location for a two storey home of the design, facade & materials you want to use or a two lot subdivision (S.T.C.A)
Located within minutes of the Drysdale shopping precinct, local schools and within walking distance to the beach, the golf club and the Clifton Springs Boat Harbour. This elevated block is on the high side of the street enabling you to build your dream home with commanding views of Geelong and across Corio Bay. Block size 685 sqm.
You are able to view this property 7 days a week by private inspection. We have created an environment to look and purchase safely. Please contact us to arrange a time to do so.
Insights: 33 Gwinganna Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Family Living At Its Finest
The Feel:
Boasting bay views & close proximity to Drysdale village, this custom-built family home (HIA Awards finalist) is located in a prestigious locale. This substantial property comprises 4 sizable bedrooms, including a grand master with private balcony & Bay views, his 'n' hers WIRs & a spa en-suite with twin vanities & double shower. Four living areas include a home theatre room, entertainers kitchen & the convenience of a home office at the entry. Space & style is yours on Sundial Drive.
The Facts:
-Custom 2-storey urban lifestyle property w/ zoned floorplan for entertaining & family life
-Elevated Master captures panoramic views of Corio Bay, the You Yangs & surrounding countryside
-Spacious, light-filled living areas & outstanding design features
-Seamless connection to private entertaining area with merbau decking
-High ceilings, wide tiled entry & Southern Box floating floors extend the sense of spaciousness
-Superb fixtures, custom window furnishings & quality carpet flooring throughout
-Ducted Inverter heating & cooling ensures total comfort
-Front entry with adjacent private home office
-Cinema with raised seating platform, 4K Ultra HD Projector, 100 fixed screen & surround sound
-Cinema lounges are included in sale
-Family lounge with 50 tv & direct access to protected alfresco entertaining
-OP kitchen/dining/living at the rear with cosy gas log fire
-Chefs kitchen w/ superior European appliances & enormous WI butler's pantry w/ additional sink.
-Smeg 900mm gas/electric cooker & range hood, Bosch dishwasher & glass splashback
-Fully equipped laundry with laundry chute & walk-in storeroom
-Powder room convenient to the living zones
-Understair storeroom & ample storage throughout
-5-star master suite with 42 tv, bay-view balcony, His n Hers WIRs & luxurious en-suite
-En-suite with bay-view spa bath, twin vanities, double shower & separate WC
-Remote control ceiling fans in all bedrooms
-Generous upper living zone with built-in storage & 42 tv
-Dedicated "kids' level" with living room, big bathroom which includes bath, shower, laundry chute & separate WC & 2 BRs with BIRs & study areas
-RC DLUG with exposed agg concrete driveway & internal access
-Additional highlights inc: ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, 5.5kW solar & ducted vacuum
-Set within a short walk of all family amenities, shopping and a choice of schools
-In the heart of The Bellarine, well-known for wineries, beaches & watersports
The Owner Loves.
Raising a family in a home that is so accessible & well planned has been a joy. We love the open plan kitchen & living area that brings everyone together, with plenty of space for everyone to enjoy quiet time & study. Our days often conclude with a glass of wine overlooking the Bay & You Yangs on our private balcony.

Address: 118 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
LOOKS CAN BE DECEIVING
Due to COVID-19 Regulations, Inspections are by appointment only. Wearing of masks and social distancing apply. Contact agent to organise a time.
Looks can be deceiving, there is more behind the door of this home than what you would expect when you do a drive by. Not only one living area but two, not only three bedrooms but the option of a fourth or study.
The back yard is also larger than you would imagine too. Rarely do the kid's balls go over the fence. If they do itâs a very big kick! Vegie patches exist to feed the ever growing family. Enjoy the Undercover entertainment area with a view of the pretty garden and lush green grass.
The current owners have enjoyed being close to all the open spaces and parks for the kids to run. They have enjoyed being close to the water all year round. They are likely to remain in the area as it offers all they require plus more.
There is a choice of schools, medical centres, sporting clubs, dance groups, but wait there's more: Restaurants, cafes, bike trails etc. One of the many highlights of living here is the Bellarine Tourist Railway. Runs from Queenscliff to Drysdale on weekends and during the week in the school holidays.
What is your wish list for a home? Are you looking to downsize, buy your first home or invest? This home would be the perfect solution for any of the above options.
Tucked behind a high fence on a 609m2 (approx) it is a very quiet place to escape to.
Would you like to see whatâs behind the fence? Well call me to book a time to check it out.
Insights: 118 Beacon Point Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2014 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Short Stroll To The Waterfront
The Clifton Springs and Curlewis north facing waterfronts are both just a short stroll along the Griggs Creek walking track from this rejuvenated 3 bedroom 2 bathroom BV home. Freshly painted and with new carpets, the home enjoys a formal lounge and master bedroom at the front with an open and light filled north facing lounge and 2 further bedrooms at the rear. The outdoor entertaining flows on from the open plan living, whilst the back yard of the 685 sqm block is accessed via double gates perfect for the boat or caravan. The fantastic list of extras in this home include gas central heating, reverse cycle split system air conditioning, ample off street parking, double glazing in front windows and a Clifton Springs Primary school catchment position.

Address: 19-23 High Ridge Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
STUNNING BAY VIEWS , PRIVATE LUSH GARDENS AND SUSTAINABLE LIVING!
The earth will provide, this amazing property comes with an orchard and raised garden beds for vegetables straight to the table. The garden is a haven and frames this large solid home with your very own rainforest, which has easy to maintain matured plants, ferns, a Bromeliad collection and so much colour from the various natives and flowers. The home enjoys a formal entrance with generous lounge room, formal dining and huge second open plan space with meals, well equipped kitchen and living overlooking the atrium into the rainforest. The dwelling has been strategically positioned to achieve sunlight from its northerly orientation whilst the panoramic bay views over the vast gardens are like framed pictures through the windows. The 4 bedroom home features a master with ensuite, spa and dressing room, three further bedrooms with BIR'S all have garden and bay views, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Features include gas hydronic floor heating, 2 solar hotwater units, 12 panel 3kw solar system, gas wall heater, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum, Indian hand cut slate floor tiling, Tasmanian blackwood cabinetry & huge pantry. Outside has 16,000L of rainwater storage, electric pump plumbed to garden taps, storage, greenhouse and much more. Entertaining is easy with large verandas, undercover BBQ space, rotunda with views and gardens or just relax in your favourite spot with your cocktail or afternoon tea. A double garage & extra large workshop flow into a brilliant space suitable for a mancave, gym or storage space for the toys. With an abundance of nature, space and privacy this wonderful home nourishes the body & soul while living and enjoying the beauty of the Bellarine Peninsula's wine, food, beaches.....sheer bliss.

Address: 2/5 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
BEAUTY ON BAY SHORE
Due to COVID-19 Regulations, inspections are by appointment only. Wearing of masks and social distancing apply. Contact agent to organise a time.
As we do life circumstances change and decisions need to be made. My Vendor has thoroughly enjoyed living here but now it's time for a change.
The lounge and dining room are on the west side of the home to benefit from the afternoon sun and provide a bright and cosy atmosphere. This central living zone features a gas wall heater as well as a split system A/C. The big draw card of the property is that the master bedroom has a WIR and an ensuite bathroom which is very rarely seen in this price bracket.
Being the rear unit it is discreetly tucked away from the street so road noise will never be a problem. The car will be secure in the single lock up garage.
Clifton Springs is a suburb on the edge of Corio Bay so if you enjoy walking a stroll down to the water's edge will reveal the You Yangs and the large ships moving in and out for the Bay. Yachts really enjoy this bay too. Enquire today for your private inspection.
.

Description:
Unsurpassed Views - 2 Titles, Expressions of Interest Close 27th August @ 5pm
Situated on the cliff, with unsurpassed panoramic vistas of the bay, this magnificent 5145m² (approx.) allotment has to be one of the best parcels Victoria has to offer. Currently on two titles with the bayside title reaching the high water mark, you can enjoy private beach access and have the option of selling the second block off separately or enjoying the space and privacy it provides.
The existing home is grand in proportions and could benefit from an update or simply start again with your dream home in this amazing location.
Downstairs comprises a large living area with open fire place and reverse cycle air conditioning and two bedrooms all with extraordinary views, bathroom with bath and separate shower, kitchen and dining room, huge laundry plus internal access from the double garage. Upstairs features a further four bedrooms, updated bathroom and a further kitchen and living area with a large balcony to take in the serenity.
With an additional single garage and carport plus shedding this is both the complete package and a potential blank canvas. Embrace the beauty of the surrounding Bellarine with boat launching facilities, golf and bowling club and The Dell bayside parkland and beach walkways all just a stroll away.
With so much to offer and so much further potential, an inspection here is simply a must.
Insights: 49-51 Clifton Street, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 1993.

Description:
Mid century Magic! As Neat as a Pin!
This home provides quality living and has been fastidiously maintained and perfectly presented. It is ready for its lucky new owner.
Well positioned with an easy walk to the beach and golf course. Situated in a quiet street and friendly neighbourhood.
Custom designed with mid-century themes, with all living spaces facing north to maximise natural light and the benefits of passive solar energy. Features a spacious lounge and formal dining area, a classically streamlined kitchen with plenty of bench space and garden outlook. Three good sized bedrooms with robes, master with ensuite. Plenty of storage space inside and out.
Outside you will find a generous workshop adjoining the double carport. The house is surrounded by beautiful, manicured gardens and features a sunny patio.
This house provides the perfect canvas for you to simply buy and put your feet up.

Description:
Family Delight
Look no further, for this well designed solid brick home with three bedrooms, one bathroom and a massive rumpus room sitting perfectly in the heart of Clifton Springs on a large 597sqm block.
Nestled behind large double colourbond gates sits this well maintained residence with a large double garage at the front and a separate undercover alfresco area at the back. There's plenty of space for all of your family and guests to have BBQs or just chill out.
Jump in the five person spa with a swim extension to unwind and relax after a hard day.
Enter into the large living area with views to the front manicured gardens and this room is kept comfortable with a split system, providing perfect heating and cooling.
The dining and kitchen are very roomy with plenty of natural light showcasing the polished timber floors that really lift this home. The modern kitchen with plenty of cupboard space has a .900mm gas cooktop and a wall oven, dishwasher and an island bench that will impress with its size.
The central bright bathroom with plenty of natural light has a large shower, bath and vanity
The bedrooms are very generous in size with built in robes, one bedroom is currently used as study / retreat.
This home has a massive rumpus room that has unlimited potential, possibly being a self contained unit or a games room and its size would allow large gatherings of family and friends. It's just another extra attraction to this fantastic home and it has its own cooling and heating with a split system.
This home is a must to inspect with its stand-out features that presents many benefits on such a great block.
Come live and play on the Bellarine.

Description:
A STUNNING OPPORTUNITY TO BUILD YOUR DREAM!
This is your opportunity to secure a prime allotment of approx 585m2 in a sought after position in Clifton Springs surrounded by established quality homes. This fantastic site features a gentle elevation of the land allowing for spectacular bay views stretching from the You Yangs to the Geelong skyline. Enjoy an easy walk to the Clifton Springs bowling club, golf club, the stunning swimming beach at the Dell and a 2 minute drive to the popular and recently upgraded Clifton Springs boat ramp. Live life in style by the sea with everything the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer on your door step including award winning wineries, restaurants, schools, shops and medical centres. You will also enjoy easy access to Geelong or take the ferry from Portarlington to Melbourne. This is one not to be missed!!!
Disclaimer:

Description:
Enticing Charm With Exciting Possibilities!
Instantly appealing, 3 Wanawong Court offers a wonderful opportunity for first home buyers, downsizers or renovators with an eye for the future to see the unlimited possibilities this property has to offer. Classic in design this home offers a clean, blank palette to create the ultimate family home or solid investment opportunity. Featuring a classic floorplan design, complemented by 3 bedrooms with built in robes and a spacious formal lounge/dining area which gives a wonderful sense of space. The practical kitchen is offset by a large living room which leads to the low maintenance private backyard. What sets this property apart from the majority of the residential homes in Clifton Springs is the ability to park your boat or caravan off the street. Undeniably, the location is highly sought after being closely located to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for, a short stroll to public transport, excellent array of the area's finest schools, public or private, multiple choice of shopping centres close by & access to the Bellarine Peninsula's world class restaurants & wineries. An inspection is a must to fully appreciate this beautiful home.
Insights: 3 Wanawong Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 94 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
FHOG + Home Builders grant = $45,000
With the available grants from the government for building new, why would you consider any other option.
Property near the water with the best of views tends to be tightly held. Until now.......
Take advantage of the opportunity to secure a well-positioned, established 613m2 (approx.) allotment with incredible Northerly and Westerly views available from a 2nd storey at a fraction of the price of buying in a new estate.
Clifton Springs land with views is very affordable and is a well-kept secret on the Bellarine. The location of this block offers a short walk to the beach and family reserves at "The Dell" offering BBQ areas, rotundas and a magical setting on a private, child friendly beach.
The golf course, bistro & bowls club are also a short walk away.
A quick trip by car will deliver you to a number of the Peninsula's best attractions including award winning wineries, historical sites, great beaches, regular markets, annual events AND neighbours Queenscliff where you can jump on the ferry and enjoy a day trip on the Mornington Peninsula. And now with the ferry service from Portarlington to Melbourne, living on the Bellarine Peninsula has never been so convenient.
Call Dion today on 0424 940 629 to learn more.
Insights: 94 Bay Shore Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
2 Homes in 1 !
The Feel:
Explore the versatility offered by a property that can be configured as either one home with up to 5 beds/2 living, or dual occupancy with a main house plus fully self-contained living for extended family or Airbnb rental opportunity. Breathtaking panoramic views of Corio Bay & the You Yangs are enjoyed from the storybook master bedroom & new upper deck, with vantage points also from the ground floor. Vaulted ceilings, gas & wood fire heaters, ducted heating, plus SSAC add ultimate comfort to this home situated in tranquil pocket of Clifton Springs.
The Facts:
-Impressive character-filled home on 780sqm approx. elevated site overlooking world class vista
-Positioned to capture breathtaking views of Corio Bay, the You Yangs & surrounding countryside
-Ficus trees & jasmine herald your arrival, from a timber boardwalk to an expansive 360 verandah
-4-5BR residence + 3 bathrooms, study nook, 2 living/dining rooms, 2 kitchens & laundries
-Main kitchen features large countertops & Bosch double oven & Bosch dishwasher with Samsung cooktop
-Second kitchen has Kleenmaid electric wall oven, gas cooktop & ample storage
-Gas log fireplace with mantelpiece delivers lifestyle appeal to the formal living & dining zone
-Woodfire heater in family living room with sliding door to front deck
-High ceilings & timber flooring extend the sense of space
-Master bedroom with bay views from dorma windows, + ensuite & BIR
-Panoramic bay views from multiple bedrooms with upstairs offering versatile bed or 3rd living
-Shared access interconnected bathroom downstairs with bay views, shower, vanity & toilet
-Well-built home with thermal efficiency (roof insulated with lambs wool)
-Garden workshop + remote control double garaging with insulation & powder coated steel shelving
-Established garden with raised veggie boxes, citrus trees, 6,800L of rainwater for garden
-Additional features include: ducted heating/cooling, LED lights, ceiling fans & security alarm system
-Enjoy all that the Bellarine has to offer: wineries, farms, eateries, coffee shops, distilleries, breweries and fresh seafood/ produce!
-A few short minutes by car to Portarlington-Melbourne passenger Ferry
- Only 25 mins to Geelong and rail stations commuting to Melbourne
SELF CONTAINED UNIT comprises (if closed off from main house):
-Set up a games room/teenagers retreat, accommodate extra family, or Airbnb from this space!
-Private entry to carpeted living & dining room with gas log fire & ceiling fan
-Full size kitchen with bamboo flooring, Kleenmaid electric wall oven, gas cooktop & ample storage
-Bathroom with new shower screen & tapware, plus separate toilet
-2 bedrooms (1 downstairs with BIR, 1 upstairs with storybook character, bay views, en suite & BIR)
The Owner Loves.
We have always loved watching the ships sail by from our bedroom, & the upper deck allows us to share the incredible bay views with friends its glorious at sunset. This home offers us the flexibility of using it in its entirety, or closing off the south end for fully self-sufficient stays.

Description:
UNIQUE DEVELOPMENT PROPERTY 1797m2
Sprawling, ranch style home built to last. Comprising 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 2 living areas, this solidly constructed brick veneer home situated in the quiet tree-lined streets of Clifton Springs is a unique opportunity.
Spacious light filled living with sought after northerly aspect. This home is a diamond in the rough and waiting for that motivated renovator. The formal lounge could easily become a fourth bedroom or study/home office.
HUGE DEVELOPMENT POTENTIAL HERE ! Extended family living options aplenty.
Massive 7m x 12m shedding with power and concrete flooring, 2 water tanks and ancillary shedding. Single garage with mezzanine for extra storage.

This beautifully positioned 585m² block is ready for a new home to built on.
Enjoy easy access to the local supermarkets, schools, beaches, boat ramp, wineries, ferry services and everything the Bellarine has to offer.
Geelong is located approx 20 mins drive.

Description:
Storybook Charm
Radiating character and charm, this Clifton Springs home will tug at the heartstrings, while offering convenient and practical living.
First impressions are lasting and, in this instance, will leave your wanting more. A private and secure fence allowing you to enjoy the manicured front garden, with a full-length verandah and front alfresco.
Neat as a pin, the kitchen is equipped with electric cooking, dishwasher and ample storage overlooking the dining area. A separate living with an inviting gas feature fire completes the fore of the home. 3 bedrooms sit from the central hallway; master with walk-in-robe and ensuite, with built-in-robes in the remaining 2 bedrooms. The rear of the home hosts a sundrenched 2nd living and study nook, which effortlessly flows through to a fully enclosed outdoor deck; the perfect space to bask in the sun and enjoy the enviable northern aspect. The central family bathroom with shower, bath and feature vanity, separate toilet and laundry with outdoor entry complete this ideal package.
Manicured gardens both front and back offer a wealth of options to sit and enjoy your morning coffee in your own private oasis.
Additional features include heating and cooling, character features throughout, 602m2 parcel, tandem carport and an oversized single garage a higher than usual entry.
Located in a peaceful pocket of Clifton Springs, you're only minutes away from all amenities, public transport, schools and cafes. Make your Bellarine move today and enjoy everything that we have to offer!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Entry Level Buying with Phenomenal Garaging!
Set within a quiet pocket of Clifton Springs and being only a 5-minute walk to the Bay, this entry level home offers something that none of the others have
The home is set behind a private and secure fence, with established gardens offering a tranquil front court yard. A high double carport leads through to the expansive 7 x 5.6m garage, which then offers a further 3 workshops/sheds - perfect for those wanting secure storage for multiple cars, caravans, boat or the perfect man cave!
The home itself is quaint, with warming and inviting timber hardwood floors. A spacious open living area flows effortlessly into the fully equipped kitchen with SS electric cooking, dishwasher and ample storage and bench space, which overlooks the meals area. 3 spacious bedrooms, 2 with built-in-robes, refurbished central family bathroom, laundry, separate toilet, and sunroom complete this neat and practical abode.
Additional features of the home include, 5kw Solar Panels, ducted heating, split system heating and cooling, ceiling fans and garden sheds.
The back garden is low maintenance with a grassed area, with scope to further personalise and make your own all upon a generous 587m2 parcel.
With all major amenities, public transport, schools and shops only moments away, this is your chance to secure a slice of the Bellarine, whether it's your first home, investment, holiday home or a downsize.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
RENOVATED, 2 LIVING AREAS, AFFORDABLE
With all the hard work already done, this charming abode will impress from the moment of entry. Deceiving from the front, a contemporary and sleek refurbishment offers a neutral palette, enriched with gorgeous timber tones that run throughout.
Streaming with natural light, this home offers a completely relaxed feel that will have you feeling at home immediately. Free flowing, the huge kitchen offers stainless steel appliances, ample storage and breakfast bench for informal dining, with a separate formal dining area and open plan living with split system heating and cooling. 3 generous size bedrooms all offer built-in-robes, the master also comprising split system and are serviced by a chic bathroom with free standing tub, timber vanity, shower and herringbone feature tiles offering a true luxe vibe. A relaxed 2nd living space sits at the rear, with the fully equipped laundry, 2nd bathroom and separate toilet completing this ready to move in abode!
Outside is low maintenance with dual sheds and gated side access for secure parking, also encompassing an open grassed area. Located within a private, no through access road, the utmost privacy and secure living is on offer, all sitting pretty on 582m2 corner block.
Schools, public transport, supermarket, shops and all major amenities on offer are at your fingertips and our world class wineries, eateries, Golf Clubs and of course our beautiful Bay only minutes away, this is a rare and affordable entry into the booming Bellarine market!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Panoramic views of Corio Bay
Imagine watching the ships ply their cargo up the shipping lanes from the moment you wake up. Offering panoramic views of the You Yangs from the commanding front undercover deck.
Spacious formal lounge with split system air conditioner & ceiling fan.
This well presented family home offers four comfortable bedrooms plus a study.
The near new kitchen with stone benchtops, oodles of draws & opaque cupboards & servery window will delight the avid chef. The five burner gas cook-top, stainless steel feature rangehood & dishwasher.
Imagine waking up in the generous master bedroom with great views of the water through plantation shutters.
A split system air conditioner & fan in the master bedroom for that perfect environment.
Large family room with vaulted ceilings, built in entertainment / display cabinet, library cabinet & easy access to the backyard.
The bathrooms have been beautifully renovated with stylish floor to ceiling tiles, large shower head & doorless entry to the shower.
The under cover timber deck over looks the back yard, with plenty of yard to play.
Separate large rumpus room would ideally suit a craft home gym needing space.
Ducted central floor heating throughout to ward away the winter chills.
Single garage would be ideally suited to a workshop or mancave.
Double gates & a long side drive allowing storage of boat or caravan behind double gates.
Close to the Clifton Springs Bowls & Golf Course, easy access to the Primary School. This is the lifestyle waiting for you.
You are able to view this property 7 days a week by private inspection. We have created an environment to look and purchase safely. Please contact us to arrange a time to do so.
Insights: 26 Boonderabbi Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern Lifestyle by the Sea
Move to the coast and enjoy all what the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer, sit back and relax from the living area and decked alfresco enjoying the water views across Corio Bay.
With multiple beaches only 1km to Ocean Grove only 14km away. Beachside living at its best, with four double bedrooms, three living zones, two bathrooms and all amenities only minutes away, the beautiful Geelong City Centre only 17km.
With a wide entrance at the front there is a large study or third living room with leads to the master ensuite with twin vanity, modern shower with adjustable rail, tiled niche, and tiled show base.
At the heart of the home is the spacious open plan living spaces, kitchen with 900mm oven/cooktop and dishwasher, stone benchtops, glass splashback, huge double fridge/freezer space with water point, large pantry and an abundance of storage.
Highlights include:
Ducted heating and ducted cooling for the entire house
Huge alfresco and decked backyard
Wide frontage with two driveways, perfect to store a caravan or boat, plus double gate to the rear yard.
Double lock up garage with rear roller door to concreted area
Elevated North facing rear yard to enjoy the amazing views across Corio Bay.
Outdoor shower
